text: I'm tired of hearing that Millennials
are the Lost Generation the
troublemakers the lazy ones we are
smarter than you think older people see
us as a foolish generation stuck looking
at our phones but the truth is that we
are shaping the world around us as
technology has advanced there's been a
huge shift in our generation and the way
we live our lives
it's called efficiency we can accomplish
a lot more in a lot less time travelling
abroad has become easier cheaper and
more mainstream thus we are going places
and learning about cultures like never
before the Masai tribe is the most well
known tribe in Kenya we are smarter than
our parents because we have access to
more information a lot of us went to
good schools and got valuable degrees
and now have amazing job I work in the
United States Senate up in the Joint
Economic Committee hi I'm Bryan I'm from
Virginia Beach and I like making videos
I also like producing my own music and I
also do photography too on the side
encyclopedias have been replaced with
Wikipedia the Internet and social media
are allowing us to learn more and
connect with like-minded individuals
gadgets like Mac books and iPhones make
learning anything readily available at
our fingertips we have figured out ways
to work remotely
we are self-motivated and determined
collective change we have figured out
ways to innovate
Mark Zuckerberg Evan Spiegel Brian
Chesky these guys are all my age or a
little older we are more
health-conscious than any other
generation so that a Goldman Sachs
report and basically Millennials tend to
be healthier because they're less likely
to smoke so more likely eat healthier
and more likely to exercise we closely
watched what we are eating we have
stronger motivations to work out and we
even have app to check our progress of
course we do have our flaws such as not
buying a house or spending unnecessary
time on social media or not saving for
our future but the bottom line is that
Millennials don't get credit for how
smart and successful we are that
nobody sees how many of us put in the
hours an hour to do big things give us a
chance because the future is ours
I'm Drew Pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
